mapper.select: {call UPA_COMMENT_LIST_SEL( #{page, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{size, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{contentId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{domain, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{orderType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=jmnet.moka.common.data.mybatis.support.EnumCode}, #{keyword, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{status, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=jmnet.moka.common.data.mybatis.support.EnumCode}, #{startDt, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{endDt, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{memType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{searchType, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{groupId, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{useTotal, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{total, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=java.lang.Long} )}
